jobDescription: Were on the hunt for an experienced Senior Data Analyst who ranks in the top quartile among their peers. Someone who has a highly competitive and entrepreneurial mindset that is wired with a team-first attitude, has no problem rolling up their sleeves to execute their missions, and can modulate between leading and following as needed. You will serve as the Senior Data Analyst. What Youll Be DoingTo analyze data coming from OEM/Manufacturers raw data and to codify it into the database, while spending more than 85% of the time as a parts and/or labor developerTo produce the quantity of data files at the quality agreed and ensure excellent quality of the data files in line with company targetsTo actively collaborate with the team by providing input for the preparation of plans and forecasts, additionally, to analyze output reports and initiate corrective actionAre You Qualified?Write computer language codeTroubleshoots issues and resolves errorsEffectively communicate ideasProgramming and development and SQLMulti-task, prioritize, coordinate projects and meet simultaneous deadlinesOrganize and plan workMinimum of 3-5 years experience in Automotive Industry, preferredResult/output drivenQuality output oriented / Detail orientedFluency in the local language and proficient in English (written and oral)Works independently within the frame of work and objectives defined with supervisor/manager and reports regularly on progress.Ensures a strong internal line of communication with data development team membersPotential to growTarget oriented, entrepreneurial, flexible, and innovative approach to operational management.Passion, humility, integrity, positive attitude, mission-driven, and self-directed.Bachelors degree in Computer Engineering / Computer Programming / Management Information Systems / Computer Science
